ADC_UI

Maintain ADC rules via an APEX frontend.  This package implements the methods required to maintain ADC rule groups via an APEX application.

Author:: Juergen Sieben, ConDeS GmbH

Functions
C_TRUE
function C_TRUE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around ADC_UTIL.C_TRUE

C_FALSE
function C_FALSE
return adc_util.flag_type

Method for determining truth values. Wrapper around ADC_UTIL.C_FALSE

process_export_cgr
procedure process_export_cgr

Method to download one or many rule groups as a zip file

process_export_cat
procedure process_export_cat

Method to download action type definitions as a zip file

get_export_type
function get_export_type
return varchar2

Method to calculate the initial export state based on session state settings

Returns

One of the states ALL|APP|SGR

validate_edit_cat
function validate_edit_cat
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_CAT

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (CAT = ADC Action Types).

process_edit_cat
procedure process_edit_cat

Method to process page EDIT_CAT

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CAT = ADC Action Types).

function validate_edit_cif
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_CIF

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (CIF = ADC Action Item Focus).

process_edit_cif
procedure process_edit_cif

Method to process page EDIT_CIF

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CIF = ADC Action Item Focus).

function validate_edit_cit
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_CIT

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (CIT = ADC Page Item Type).

process_edit_cit
procedure process_edit_cit

Method to process page EDIT_CIT

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CIT = ADC Page Item Type).

validate_edit_ctg
function validate_edit_ctg
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_CTG

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (CTG = ADC Action Type Groups).

process_edit_cpt

Method to process page EDIT_cpt

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (cpt = ADC Action Parameter Value Type).

handle_cpv_changed
procedure handle_cpv_changed

Method is called if the user changes the Action Parameter Visual Type of a Action Parameter.

It checks whether the parameter requires a select list or a static list. If so, it shows and initializes these regions, otherwise it hides the regions.

validate_edit_cpt
function validate_edit_cpt
return boolean

Method to validate page EDIT_cpt

Is called to validate user data if the page is submitted. (cpt = ADC Action Parameter Value Type).

process_edit_ctg

Method to process page EDIT_CTG

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CTG = ADC Action Type Groups).

process_edit_cpt_static_list
procedure process_edit_cpt_static_list

Method to process page detail form R5_CPT_STATIC_LIST_FORM

Is called to persist user data if the page is submitted. (CTG = ADC Action Type Groups).

set_action_export_cgr
procedure set_action_export_cgr

Method to maintain APEX actions for page EXPORT_CGR.

Is called if relevant changes are reported to ADC.

Application support methods
calculate_prev_next
procedure calculate_prev_next

Method to automoatically calculate previous and next button values based on navigation list

get_adc_admin_url
function get_adc_admin_url
return varchar2

Method calculates for the UTL to address the ADC rule in the ADC administration application.  This method is called from an application process to set the URL for a page button

Returns

URL for the ADC admin designer page of the actual application page

validate_p6_date
procedure validate_p6_date

Method to validate a date field.

Checks whether a date is in the future and wether it is a working day.

validate_p6_number
procedure validate_p6_number

Method to validate a number field

Checks whether a number is between 100 and 1000 and divisible by 3.

is_comm_eligible
function is_comm_eligible(
p_job_id in hr_jobs.job_id%type
)
return adc_util.flag_type

Method to check whether the supplied job is eligible for a commission_pct.  This is detected by queriying column JOBS.COMM_ELIGIBLE

print_text
procedure print_text(
p_text_id in varchar2
)

Method to print a description text SADC.<P_TEXT_ID>. Is used to print html coded text into dynamic PL/SQL regions

Parameter
p_text_id
in varchar2

ID of the text

validate_edpti
function validate_edpti
return boolean

Methods to validate page edpti

Returns

Always true. If any exception occurred, this is registered in the APEX exception stack.

process_edpti
procedure process_edpti

Methods to process changes to page edpti

procedure adact_control_action

Methods to maintain page adact

print_help_text
procedure print_help_text(
p_cat_id in adc_action_types.cat_id%type
)

Method prints the help text for a given action type on the documentation pages

Parameter
p_cat_id
in adc_action_types.cat_id%type

ID of the action type to print the help text for

get_help_text
function get_help_text(
p_cat_id in adc_action_types.cat_id%type
)
return varchar2

Method returns the help text for a given action type on the documentation pages

Parameter
p_cat_id
in adc_action_types.cat_id%type

ID of the action type to print the help text for

Returns

Help text, if available.
